info.author: Chris Miles
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
This module provides a BooleanForm class, which acts like widgets.Form, except that
it displays two submit buttons, one for confirming the action, the other for cancelling.
info.name: TGBooleanFormWidget
info.summary: A yes/no or confirm/cancel input widget for TurboGears projects.
info.html_description: This module provides a BooleanForm class, which acts like widgets.Form, except that it displays two submit buttons, one for confirming the action, the other for cancelling.
